#summary How to install and run JTALIS

==Install JTALIS==




==Run our test cases with JTALIS==

 * Download and unzip data files dbSib-XXXX.jtalis.tar.gz (static data) and rdfPostStream-YYYY-month1.jtalis.tar.gz (stream of posts) for test cases that you want to test. 
 * Download and unzip the file queryX.jtalis.tar.gz for the query that you want to run. In the unzipped folder, you will find a file _.event_ and some file _config.xml_ or _config-multiple.xml_, depending on whether we ran this query with the scalability test wrt. the number of queries.
 * Modify config.xml or config-multiple.xml to point to the input data/stream files.
 * Finally, run: $JTALIS_HOME/scripts/jtalis-run.sh $JTALIS_HOME/pom.xml $PATH_TO_CONFIG_FILE
